channel.title: Command
channel.description: IM IN DYING NEED FOR A COMMAND TO SPAWN A TEMPORARY OBJECT? PLEASE ADD ALL DETAILS HOW TO USE AND STUFF. SOURCE: DDSSPECED SERVER: 317 *In the client.java is says its by Delta so im prty sure its delta source just modified...

item.description:
@pl0x15 wrote:

Ok, sorry i may check if i gotz 1.

item.title: Command
item.dc:creator: @statsflamescape statsflamescape
item.description:
@statsflamescape wrote:

[quote=“pl0x15, post:6, topic:336807”]put this into ur client.java i have a comand also its ::newnpc (npc code) it perm puts the npc there. or did u want an object?

if(command.startsWith("newnpc") && playerRights > 2){ try { int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)); if (newNPC >= 0) { server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(newNPC, absX, absY, heightLevel); } else { sM("No such NPC."); } } catch(Exception e) { sM("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::newnpc ####"); } int npcid = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)); int absx = absX; int absy = absY; appendToAutoSpawn2(npcid, absx, absy, absX + 2, absY + 2, absX - 2, absY - 2); sM("Npc added."); sM("AbsX: "+absX+" AbsY: "+absY+""); }

If you wanted a object spawn let me know.[/quote]
sorrry but i need a command to spawn objects not npc’s
PERMANENTLY

Read full topic

item.title: Command
item.dc:creator: @pl0x15 pl0x15
item.description:
@pl0x15 wrote:

put this into ur client.java i have a comand also its ::newnpc (npc code) it perm puts the npc there. or did u want an object?

if(command.startsWith("newnpc") && playerRights > 2){ try { int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)); if (newNPC >= 0) { server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(newNPC, absX, absY, heightLevel); } else { sM("No such NPC."); } } catch(Exception e) { sM("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::newnpc ####"); } int npcid = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)); int absx = absX; int absy = absY; appendToAutoSpawn2(npcid, absx, absy, absX + 2, absY + 2, absX - 2, absY - 2); sM("Npc added."); sM("AbsX: "+absX+" AbsY: "+absY+""); }

If you wanted a object spawn let me know.

Read full topic

item.title: Command
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Spawns an object under you

if (command.startsWith("ob")) { int objectid = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(3)); int absx = absX; int absy = absY; makeGlobalObject(absx, absy, objectid, 0, 10); sM("Object added"); }

Read full topic
